mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.region AS "region", a.detail_location AS "detailLocation", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.location AS "location"
mapper.select: select location from business_circle where id = #{circleId} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_circle( id, name, description, province, city, region, detail_location, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, location ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{province}, #{city}, #{region}, #{detailLocation}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{location} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_circle SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, region = #{region}, detail_location = #{detailLocation}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, location = #{location} WHERE id = #{id}
